articles.description: Follow live text updates as England face West Indies in the first of three one-day internationals in Antigua.
articles.title: West Indies v England, first ODI - toss and team news

articles.description: Dejan Kulusevski heads an equaliser in the 90th minute as Tottenham earn a dramatic Premier League draw against Manchester City.
articles.title: Kulusevski late leveller for Spurs rocks Man City

articles.description: Trent Alexander-Arnold scores an 88th-minute winner as Liverpool mount a stunning late comeback to beat Fulham in a seven-goal thriller at Anfield.
articles.title: Alexander-Arnold scores late as Liverpool win thriller

articles.description: Follow live text commentary as fourth-placed Barcelona host Atletico Madrid, who sit third, in La Liga.
articles.title: La Liga: Barcelona v Atletico Madrid

articles.description: Enzo Fernandez scores twice as 10-man Chelsea hold on to beat Brighton in a five-goal thriller at Stamford Bridge.
articles.title: Ten-man Chelsea hold on to beat Brighton

articles.description: Rory McIlroy says he cannot understand "anger" towards plans to roll back golf-ball technology to reduce the distance they can travel.
articles.title: McIlroy backs plans to reduce golf ball distances

articles.description: Ollie Watkins heads in a 90th-minute equaliser as Aston Villa twice came from behind to draw with Bournemouth in a thrilling Premier League game.
articles.title: Watkins rescues point for Villa at Bournemouth

articles.description: Uefa says it is investigating after sex noises were transmitted during the broadcast of the Euro 2024 draw on Saturday.
articles.title: Uefa investigates after sex noises disrupt Euros draw

articles.description: Mitchell Johnson questions whether former Australia team-mate David Warner should be given a "hero's send-off" in Pakistan Test series.
articles.title: Johnson questions 'hero's send-off' for Warner

articles.description: UFC president Dana White criticises a referee for failing to end a bout earlier, with the official's delayed decision angering fighters.
articles.title: UFC boss White criticises referee over 'bad stoppage'
